Articles.Content:
Evening all.

Saw this game in Steam about a week ago while I was re-downloading a game. Videos looked amusing so I thought I'd give it a go (I neglected to get it from Steam - I avoid it if I can). I haven't had this level of childish fun in a video game for a long, long time so I've basically lost entire days to it so far.

My ventures so far have been to get 2 satellites in matching circular but perpendicular orbits. I've built a (horribly inefficient) craft to get a Kerbal to the MÃƒÂ¼n. Got there too - just can't land the bugger. Tonight I started building a space station, although I have yet to actually... y'know... dock anything together. The first piece is up there now though.

I can sense this little gaming gem is going to completely destroy my work ethic and sabotage my thesis, so expect to see me around asking stupid questions.

Cheers,

~M
